oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exercise yards in Finland - structures and environmental impact
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Puumala, Maarit
Uusi-Kämppä, Jaana
Nykänen, Arja
Heinonen-Tanski, Helvi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two exercise yards have been designed, constructed and monitored. Samples from the runoff water have been taken regularly, and their nutrient concentrations(nitrogen, phosphor), total solids, pH, total chemical oxygen demand and hygienic quality have been analysed. The behaviour of animals has been observed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Puumala, Maarit; Uusi-Kämppä, Jaana; Nykänen, Arja and Heinonen-Tanski, Helvi (2003) Exercise yards in Finland - structures and environmental impact. Paper at: Nordic agriculture in global perspective: NJF's 22nd congress, July 1-4, 2003.
